description: Let’s not pretend this sexual counter is something it isn’t: Dolf Dietrich is very tall and Rafael Lords is rather short (the scene photography doesn’t lie). And it’s exactly this reason why Dolf and Rafael wanted to give it a go -- they’re both up for a challenge. And when these two men get together -- two men that love wild and kinky sex -- the energy explodes.
title: Rafael Lords Takes Dolf Dietrich For A Ride
